reviews.review: лучшая игра для двух людей
晕3d千万别买，吐了后，头晕了三天都没缓过来

A nearly decade old game, and it still is a really solid game. I have only played the single player. So I have no idea how the multiplayer is. But the single player is so good. I usually really suck at puzzles, but I was able to solve most of the puzzles on my own. There were some puzzles I needed a little help on, but that's on me. I also love that most of them take minutes to solve and a few seconds to execute. Rather than most puzzles where you solve it in a few seconds and takes minutes to execute

But there where very few exceptions. There was one puzzles where I had to run and jump into a portal on a pillar. Only because it was difficult to get into the portal. Moving at high speeds while trying to get into a small portal is tough. Good idea, but extremely hard to do. maybe if the service you had to shoot your portal gun was bigger. Then maybe it would have been manageable

Also because this is a valve game, the Steam Input API support is really good. Changing any function in steam input works perfectly. Like if on the ps4 controller. If you want Circle as accept and Cross as Back (like in japan), you can do that. The game also doesn't freak out when using keyboard, mouse and gamepad input at the same time. I use gyro aiming in this game, so this is important to me. Also with Jibb Smart's flick stick coming to Steam Input, this game controls so smoothly. My thumb gets tired when using a thumbstick for too long. So this helps.

Now for the negatives. I wished there was a function to centre the camera like in the Splatoon series. Also this is inherit with the puzzles genre. But it doesn't have replayability. The fun is with solving the puzzle. Once you solve the puzzle, that's. You've solved it. And as mentioned before, some puzzles drag on a bit too long. Some puzzles are also difficult because of some portal service that is really far away or hard to see

But overall, it's still a great game with really smart puzzle design. Usually when you see a hint for a puzzle you can't solve, you would usually say "Why didn't I think of that?". The story is also really good. But I didn't really talk about that because I'm not that confident talking about it. So buy it if you haven't already

在传送门1已经是难得一见的精品游戏的情况下，传送门2几乎做到了全面超越，令人惊叹。
尽管单人游戏的可重复游玩性较低，但打折仅卖几块钱，换来数个小时的脑力与心灵的旅程，显然是非常值的。
给新入坑的玩家的几个小建议：
1.游戏对话较多，且很有趣，不妨先把解密放到一边，听听对话。
2.斜坡总是有用的，若是卡关了请想一想斜坡还能怎么利用。
3.通关的钥匙不一定总在前方，偶尔去走过的路看一看说不定会恍然大悟。只要没进入下一关，每个小物品都可能排上用场。
4.这也是最重要的一点：请珍惜你仅有的三个朋友，尽管TA（他，她，它）们偶尔会想要干掉你……呃，好吧，只有其中的两个，第三位只有你害死它的份（悲）。

好了，开始你的冒险吧，危险的哑巴疯子。
